Learn what the VIX, often called the market’s ‘fear gauge’, means for investors. Receive up to S$6,000 cash or S$7,000 in Signature CIO fund units when you sign up for Priority Banking today. Receive S$100 for every S$50,000 investment purchased in Eligible Unit Trust, Bonds and structured Products offered by the Bank in a single day. Exclusively for Priority Banking clients only, Earn higher interest of up to 5.00% p.a. with Wealth Saver on your deposit balances. Earn S$800 cash for each successful Priority Banking referral and S$2,000 cash for each successful Priority Private referral. Access bespoke wealth solutions and expert advice from our Chief Investment Office, plus strategic market insights to achieve your goals. Elevate your status globally with priority access to our global retail network for all your financial and cross-border needs. Enjoy priority exclusives such as preferential rates, access myRM on-the-go, myWealth Advisor, and more. Enjoy an array of exclusive and curated lifestyle benefits across Singapore and globally. Access a full suite of wealth solutions to keep your financial goals on track Bank and transact conveniently whenever you are We simplified our application process to bring convenience to you Enjoy bespoke banking experience, exclusive products and preferential services Experience the new standard of digital banking with SC Mobile 
					Scan QR code to download SC Mobile App now				 Get fuss-free access to SC Online Trading via SC Mobile in just two taps: Invest > Equities. Now you can trade with greater connectivity, convenience and confidence. Viewing your transactions just got easier as it is now categorised into ‘Deposits’ and ‘Credit Cards’ for your easy viewing. With the 360° Rewards feature now available on the app, you can view, manage and redeem rewards all in one place. In the event that any of the terms contained herein conflict with the terms of use or other terms and guidelines contained within any such website, then the terms of use and other terms and guidelines for such website shall prevail. Thank you for visiting www.sc.com/sg
